reviews.review: Gerek hikayesiyle gerek atmosferiyle çok başarılı bir oyun. Oynamanızı tavsiye ederim
Best FPS game of all time
结局真是神反转！

Прошла на одном дыхании. После этой части, скупила все остальные + дополнения. Однозначно влюбилась в данный тайтл😍 Сюжет, разнообразие локаций, ачивки, квесты... Супер. В конце полнейшее опустошение моей душеньки. Была подавлена весь вечер, да и до сих пор сердце кровью обливается. Как жаль, что нельзя забыть и перепройти заново. 
P. S. Всё время ждала, когда же они переспят...
뭔지도 모르고 걍 엘리자베스 얼굴만 보고 산 게임 FPS 개못하고 멀미만 오지게 나는데 엘리자베스 얼굴은 봐야겠네요

One of my favourites of the Bioshock series. The enviroments and combat flow together very nicely but the story is at times a bit to out there to truly understand it without going on youtube for an explaination( *cough* ending)

[i]BioShock Infinite[/i] oynanmadan önce [i]BioShock[/i] ve [i]BioShock 2[/i]'nin, özellikle [i]BioShock[/i]'un oynanmasını tavsiye ederim. Oynandıktan sonra ise [i]Burial at Sea[/i] adlı iki bölümden oluşan indirilebilir içeriğin de oynanmasını tavsiye ederim.
Просто дико оригинальная концовка. Это та игра, в конце которой хочется сказать: "Вау, оно того стоило!"

电影一样的剧情和流程，画面优秀，伊丽莎白塑造的是真出色，无论是表情还是人物情感，令人印象深刻。游戏通关只需要10小时不到，所以一周目最好打慢点，体验下剧情，二周目感觉不需要了，故事结局一旦知道就不会那么惊人了。
Too beautiful

Would highly recommend this game. I got it on sale, and had hours of fun. Don't really understand the ending but FUN aha.  I find the first games a little scary, so haven't played them. Didn't feel like a miss out on anything from not playing them.
很好的游戏，代入感很强，伊丽莎白真的是个好队友，但是还没玩完，已经感觉非常不错了

I AM COMPLETELY STUNNED..!!

After just completing the game, I am in total shock. So stunned that I couldn't even skip the credits. Without spoiling anything, you will be completely amazed of how they decided to end it off.

It's a great game and a cool change from a city at the bottom of the ocean to a city in the sky. The scene where you are lifted to Columbia is just as breathtaking as seeing Rapture for the first time. As soon as this scene happens, you know you're playing a Bioshock game.

People have been also wondering how Elizabeth's AI is. Absolutely flawless, this is in no way a co-op game like Resident Evil 5. You don't have to revive her or give her any ammo or anything of that sort.

Their are some horror elements to this game similar to Rapture, but it's more focused on Action and sci-fi. There is one part that did scare the hell out of me though.

Kudos to Irrational for another masterpiece. If you thought the story telling in Bioshock 1 was incredibly done, just wait till you get a load of this!

I give it a solid 10/10.
画面打击感和音效都非常棒，并且剧情不无聊，值得入手

I have never had my mind blown like this in any game I have ever played. Holy fuck I know I am late, but god damn my head hurts im gonna go lay down and think about what i was just put through.... great fucking game
it's an amazing game 10/10
it took me a good 3 hours to figure out the ending, 10/10, best story in any game I have ever played.
I never thought I would be the one to fall in love with a girl in a video game. Why can't I marry her?!?!
Jogabilidade ótima, além da história excelente.

Com todo o respeito às duas obras-primas que são dois primeiros Bioshocks (principalmente ao 2, que é um dos jogos mais injustiçados da história), mas o Infinite é o melhor da trilogia sem sombra de dúvidas. Eu demorei 7 longos anos pra jogar esse jogo, tendo ficado no hype desde antes do lançamento, e ele conseguiu de alguma forma ultrapassar todas as minhas expectativas e valer cada minuto esperado. Acho que injustiça maior que esse jogo ter perdido o GOTY de 2013 pro pior GTA já lançado, só o Botafogo perdendo a Copa do Brasil de 99.
Its a trip
This game is way ahead of its time. One of the best single player shooters if not the best.

真的很喜欢这种蒸汽朋克风格的游戏，剧情开始会有些迷，但是玩完后一定会被惊艳到。海葬第二章开头的巴黎超级美！还有，伊丽莎白是真的让我泪目了

这个游戏好评如潮，记得曾经看过一篇文章，描述的是：“如果一个游戏多半好评，也许不好玩，但是好评如潮的游戏一定好玩，恰恰这就是一款这样的游戏！！！”

挺杀时间的，但是也真心好玩，畅快淋漓，故事性很强！


用狙击和散弹枪搭配，再加上放电异能，太过瘾了！！！

Enredo maravilhoso, boa mecânica e sistema de combate. O roteiro do jogo é uma obra cinematográfica e o melhor dentro da trilogia, com direito a um excelente plot twist no final da campanha. Vale muito a pena jogar as DLCs também e a forma como a historia se conecta com o primeiro jogo é surpreendente.

Super recomendo toda a trilogia BioShock, uma das melhores trilogias já feitas no mundo dos jogos!
